overview: Philadelphia's own Daryl Hall and John Oates shine in this unforgettable concert recorded at the BBC Theatre. Join the two consummate rockers as they spell out the m-e-t-h-o-d of modern pop with exhilarating live versions of "She's Gone," "Laughing Boy," "Camellia," "Lady Rain," "Is It a Star?" and "I'm Just a Kid (Don't Make Me Feel Like a Man)."
title: Rock Masters: Hall & Oates
